name: Can You Survive 3 Nights?
description:
***NOTE: there was a bug (on certain devices) that would cause the app to crash when the player selected a character. I have fixed that bug and re-uploaded the game here.  I don't know if it will also fix the Scream Jam 2021 submission.  I apologize if it doesn't and it crashes as you play the Scream Jam 2021 submission.

This is an Android game that can be played on your phone or a tablet.  It is unfinished (mainly lacking the desired visuals) but it does have audio (and some rather disturbing audio during the night time sections).  But give it a try.  The game can be played/completed in about 5 minutes (or less, depending on how fast you are killed!  Haha!)

This game was created (to it's current state) in about 5 days for Scream Jam 2021.  This is my first time entering a scream jam and I wanted to give it a shot.  I created this game by myself (GO Team Me!).  I hope you enjoy the game and I have plans to finish it and release it on Google Play as an official app by the end of the year.

Triggers/ Warnings:

-audio violence/gore (bones breaking, screaming)

-light stalking/intimidation

-fear of the unknown/dark (mostly because there are no visuals in the night time sections yet)

Credits:

-character images from Pixabay.com

-blood splatter from pngaaa.com

-red X mark created by Daniel Biddlecom

-lion head graphic from publicdomainvectors.org

-lion roar, girl screaming, bone crunching, man screaming, heavy rain, thunder and birds chirping  from freesound.org

-All coding, sound mixing, graphic design, story writing by me (Daniel Biddlecom)

Thanks for stopping by and I hope you like the game (even in it's unfinished state). 

=)
